name: Floppy Bird (xstudios)
description:
Flappy Bird remake but with a little twist to it! 

*Please note that this game is currently in development*

Release roadmap (tentative): 

Patch 1.0: Base game - Released

Patch 1.1: Leaderboards

Patch 2.0: Mobile version release

Patch 3.0: Combat, levels and bosses
